title.rendered: Eldorado Stone Revives Traditional Texture with New, Contemporary Color

content.rendered:
SAN DIEGO, CA – Eldorado Stone infuses traditional textures with modern sophistication by introducing its newest color palette: Osso RomaBrick. The warm blonde undertones of ivory-inspired Osso provide a fresh, contemporary option for the classically minded shape of RomaBrick, bridging the gap between ancient sensibilities and present day design trends.

“The warm neutral hue of Osso RomaBrick provides unique options for exploring subtleties of tones and composition,” said Sarah Lograsso, Director of Marketing. “This compelling color palette puts a modern spin on the timeless texture of weathered brick, providing an expressive union of traditional and contemporary styles.”

TWEET THIS: #Osso RomaBrick from @eldoradostone provides an expressive union of traditional and contemporary #design styles. http://bit.ly/OssoRomaBrick #stoneveneer

Osso’s distinctively fair color palette evokes an authentic European aesthetic with a modern touch for more design versatility. Whether applied on an accent wall or as the focal point, RomaBrick offers an artistically timeworn appearance that lends texture and nuance to any space. In addition to Osso, RomaBrick is available nationwide in three classic color palettes: Brolio, Castello and Bracciano®.

Evocative of ancient Rome, RomaBrick is a wider-proportioned profile with an irregular shape that projects enormous visual interest. With a slightly thicker form, RomaBrick blends well with other Eldorado Stone profiles and varies in length from 9 inches to 10.25 inches and 1.5 inches to 2 inches in height.
